title: Kensa Collection
paragraphs: Kensa Collection are a set of Toni Kensa-branded reskins of existing weapons with new sub and special weapons in Splatoon 2, similar to Sheldon's Picks. They were first announced during the 14 September 2018 Nintendo Direct presentation. The first collection was released later on 14 September 2018 as part of version 4.0.0. The second collection was released with version 4.1.0 on 3 October 2018. The third was released with version 4.2.0, and the fourth and final collection was released alongside the 4.3.0 update.
- Inkling boy with Kensa Splat Roller.
- Inkling girl with Kensa Charger and Kensa Splatterscope.
- Octoling boy with Kensa Splat Dualies.

- The promotional images for the first two Kensa Collections feature the same characters, who are apparently models for Toni Kensa. They are shown in the promotional images with a dark gray ink color, which is only accessible during certain Splatfests.
An Inkling girl with the lightest skin tone, white eyes and the "Banger" hairstyle, wearing Half-Sleeve Sweater and Toni Kensa Black Hi-Tops with the long tights legwear option.
An Inkling boy with the lightest skintone, white eyes and the "Mush-Cut" hairstyle, wearing Toni K. Baseball Jersey and Toni Kensa Soccer Shoes with the loose shorts legwear option.
An Octoling girl with the lightest skintone, white eyes and the "Pony" hairstyle, wearing Short Knit Layers and Arrow Pull-Ons with the sporty shorts legwear option.
An Octoling boy with the middle (fourth) skintone, white eyes and the "Afro" hairstyle, wearing Toni Kensa Goggles and Panda Kung-Fu Zip-Up, barefoot with the tight shorts legwear option.

- The promotional images of Kensa Collections 3 and 4 feature three new Toni Kensa fashion models, and a returning model from the first two sets.
An Inkling boy with the second lightest skintone, white eyes and the "Topknot" hairstyle, wearing Ink-Wash Shirt and Arrow Pull-Ons with the leggings legwear option.
An Octoling girl with the lightest skintone, white eyes and the "Tentacurl" hairstyle, wearing Pullover Coat and Toni Kensa Black Hi-Tops with the long tights legwear option.
An Inkling girl with the lightest skintone, white eyes, and the "Double-Bun" hairstyle, wearing a Face Visor, a Front Zip Vest and Toni Kensa Soccer Shoes with the capri sweatpants legwear option.
The same Octoling boy from the first two Kensa Collections, only changing the ink color.
The characters have a stark white ink color in the image for Kensa Collection 3, while it is stark black in the image for Kensa Collection 4. Both of these colors, like the dark gray ink in the first promotional images, cannot appear in-game.
- All weapons from this collection also have a red clip of some sort, meant to represent Toni Kensa's logo.
- Because Toni Kensa has only three shoe options, the fourth character in Kensa Collection promotional images is always barefoot, which is only possible in-game by equipping the Friendship Bracelet.
